summary_text: A downtrodden photographer, haunted by the urban violence and decay around him, retreats into an inner world of dark fantasies.

summary_text: "All the Freckles in the World" story of a boy in his early teens trying to get attention of the school's pretty girl. Set in 90's Mexico City
